hero.description: Premium card: Glory to all we see, glory to all he is, glory to everyone who will try to escape him.

cards.description: Standard card: He has seen everything, his mind has never been asleep since the making of the realm.
cards.name: Warden
Winterfell
cards.description: Standard card: The days are cold and so are we. We hope we can close our eyes again.
Premium card: The will of Gods has been spoken, obey and you shall be saved...or not.
cards.name: Disciple

cards.description: Premium card: Fear him. Your last breath is now.
cards.name: Berserker

cards.description: Premium card: His presence is not known even by ghosts, success at all costs.

cards.description: Standard card: Thrown from the highest cliff, revenge will be his glory.
